attributes.action: Contractorise the movement of British troops and scrap this area of the RAF.
attributes.additional_details:
Over the years the RAF have proven they can drop bombs and kill the enemy from a fast jet with ease. However their ability to move a large number of troops from A to B on time and with the minimal amount of fuss has proven too difficult a task. It is therefore proposed that this area pf the RAF is scrapped and contracted to a company which can provide this service.

The service provided by the successful contractor will increase the morale of all troops as they will be back from the theatre of deployment within a certain time frame and will not suffer from a poor service which is currently being provided by the RAF.
